sentences.sContent: A meteorite streaked across the sky.
Rain had begun to streak the windowpanes.
sentences.sCn: 雨已开始在窗玻璃上留下条痕。

phrases.pCn: 超快扫描照相机；超高速扫描摄影机

remMethod.val: 和stream(n. 一串， 一股)一起记

words.tran: 有条纹的；有斑点的；容易变的；焦躁不安的
在…上加条纹；（闪电等）闪亮；飞跑（streak的过去分词形式）

trans.tranOther: to run or fly somewhere so fast you can hardly be seen

trans.tranCn: 条纹，条痕；个性特征；一阵子，一连串
trans.tranOther: a coloured line, especially one that is not straight or has been made accidentally
If something streaks a surface, it makes long stripes or marks on the surface
